doc:
Brenda Epperson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brenda_Epperson 0 Brenda Epperson (born September 9, 1965) is an American actress and singer. Epperson is best known for being the second actress to portray the character of Ashley Abbott on the CBS daytime drama The Young and the Restless. Brenda_Epperson ( born September_9_,_1965 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer . Epperson is_best_known for being the_second_actress to_portray the_character of Ashley_Abbott on the_CBS_daytime_drama The_Young and the_Restless .
